pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a static, low-angle shot of a massive pile of dark, glittering mining tailings. The pile is situated within a sun-drenched canyon, with large rock formations visible in the background. There is no discernible movement in the scene; the shot remains still throughout the clip.
